version_description:
Hey, strangers! I`ve listened to your feedback and made following changes:
1) the quality of photos increased 4Х times! - works for all new photos uploaded from this new update
2) photos do not disappear without explanation anymore - if your photo i

AntiChat 全新版本，速度、性能、設計大幅更新，越來越好用！

新功能：
1) 「超能力」讓你：
- 提升卡馬值
- 標記你的私密聊天室
- 在聊天室及個人資料中標記你的角色
- 獲得 [AntiChat] 團隊的特別協助
- 選擇特殊角色
2) 「角色」- 從100個新角色中挑選你要的角色 (avatar)。你可以隨時更換角色取得固定卡馬值。
3) 你的聊天室會分類為：
- 所有聊天室
- 私密聊天室
- 群組聊天室

注意！若 app 在更新後當機，請重新安裝。

v3.0 的更新內容？
1. 使用者終於可以選擇自己訊息的自動背景色彩了！
2. 修正 app 內購買的錯誤

ATTENTION! If the app crashes after the update, reinstall it. If you have problems with your account, Log out and press "Support" on the login screen.

New in v3.1:
+7 awesome messages background colors to choose from
+ added info button with

+ Search by Popular Chat Rooms added
+ Added an option to Block users in Group Chats. Press User's avatar -> Complain -> Block
+ Fixed bugs with in-app purchases

Any problems? Send me an email to administrator@antichat.me

1) Improved usability for the newbies
2) Improved interface of photos
3) Improved the Report function: long press any message in any chat and press "Report" to report & delete the inappropriate content immediately
4) Random private chats func

1) Meet foreigners from all over the world and Translate any of their messages to your language FREE by long pressing a message in any chat room -> "Translate"
2) Speed of loading photos increased again!
3) Fixed critical bugs which resulted in c

v 3.4.1:
- fixed minor glitches
v 3.4:
1) Meet foreigners from all over the world and Translate any of their messages to your language FREE by long pressing a message in any chat room -> "Translate"
2) Speed of loading photos increased agai

1) New logo
2) Improved performance
3) Fixed crashes
4) New screenshots

For more serious upgrades stay tuned. Next month I'm moving to Silicon Valley to bring new talents to work on this amazing chat app!

From Latvia with Love,
N

What's new in 3.6?
1) Be notified of new incoming messages with the help of in app notifications when you chat in any room
2) Push notifications will redirect you to the chats they come from, if your press them
3) You can have unlimited gifts in

WARNING! If the app freezes or crashes, try reinstalling it.

What's new in 3.7?
1) The app must not freeze anymore on iOs 9+ devices
2) The pictures sent from users of the new servers must be visible now
3) Added system warnings in case of

PLEASE UPDATE THE APP!

1) Fixed crashes on iPhone 4 & iOs 7
2) The app doesn't freeze anymore on iOs 8
3) Speed increased

Any issues, offers or suggestions? Text to administrator@antichat.me

1) Hide all chats by pressing Settings -> Privacy -> Archive all chats
2) Disable or Activate the Random private chats function by switching Settings -> Privacy -> Allow random chats
3) Random chats have become safer than ever: you can a

This is the final update of your favorite chat app in 2016:
1) The app works 10X faster
2) Photos load up to 20X faster
3) Upload photos directly by Camera
4) My Favorite chats -> will be available for active users next to Private chats. Yo

3.8.1.
+ Added icons / avatars on the left side of My Chats list
+ Fixed crashes on iPad: now you can send pictures and ban without crashes
+ Favorites: now you can manually add chats to Favorites list by pressing a chat from My Chats list ->

化身＆配件
1) 升級您的化身，有 33 種配件可任意組合，包括睫毛、皇冠、眼鏡和嘴唇
2) 化身的品質提升了 3x 倍

照片＆影片
1) 照片預覽加快 4X 倍
2) 照片品質 － 高 4X 倍
3) 照片有浮水印避免被盜用
4) 錄影和錄即時影片給新朋友

安全
1) 使用新功能，成為不可接觸的對象，拒絕所有熱度值比您低的人的新的聊天請求（設置- >隱私）
2) 加強垃圾訊息防護，防止新的私人聊天
3) 除非你多次

1) Increased performance for iOS 7 and older iPhones
2) Block function now gives you even more privacy; block a user from a private chat (Profile->Block), from a Group chat (Profile->Report->Block)
3) Founders and moderators of chat rooms h

## Dear Friends, we've been working 9 months on this outstanding update! ##

1) All your avatars and accessories get a FREE HD upgrade to look more realistic. The eyes of these avatars were designed by Admin based on a real human eye
2) Several a

4.1:
- fixed crashes on iOS 12 Beta
- fixed bugs with the camera and photos
- fixed the bugs with the links that didn't work in chat rooms

## Dear Friends, The lags are not related to any of these updates. They are traffic-related. We work

+ 10 new funny Shark Stickers
+ iOS 7 support is back, bugs and crashes fixed
+ fixed issue when new users couldn't change the age during registration (if you were affected by that issue, please send your profile link and the correct age to Support@

- fixed bugs, including the issues related to changes in Age / Nickname
- optimized some restrictions

Need help? Contact the Founder of the app via this link:
https://antichat.app.link?uid=ZY1Nl9w6MP

v4.62：錯誤修復
** v4.60：恭喜！ 到目前為止，已有22,000,000多人加入了AntiLand **
主要更新：
1.專屬頭像-水晶龍-一次只有一個人可以擁有。 系統每週都會根據活動來選擇獲勝者！
2.包括食蟻獸，黑豹和負鼠在內的新的第一類頭像
3. AVATAR STICKERS適用於所有帝國化身，大多數頭等化身和一些下等化身。 現在檢查您的頭像是否支持貼紙

更多改進：
-購買必須像瑞士手錶一樣工作，而且沒有錯誤
-修復了打開應用程

AGE SETTINGS: Finally the bug with the Age in your profile is fixed. Everyone can change it once per month now
PHOTO PREVIEW: Watch the Preview of the picture before you send it
VIDEO LIBRARY: Send short videos from your Library in private messages

- Super Powers subscription model has been upgraded to the latest requirements of the App Store: when you subscribe to Super Powers next time, the subscription will be recurring, which brings you a better user experience

Glitches fixed:
- videos must not glitch anymore
- when someone sends a gift you will not see there a glitchy image instead of avatar anymore
- when you press a push notification your avatar will not jump to the left
- in all the currencies th

v 4.51:
- fixed a critical bug with messages not loading in chat rooms

v 4.5:
Glitches fixed:
- videos must not glitch anymore
- when someone sends a gift you will not see there a glitchy image instead of avatar anymore
- when you pr

This update is extremely important for the safety of our community. We have significantly improved our automatic pre-moderation system that most of the user-generated inappropriate content will not reach the eyes of our dear users. We have grown to a mult

- Super Powers subscription model has been upgraded to the latest requirements of the App Store: when you subscribe to Super Powers next time, the subscription will be recurring, which brings you a better user experience

** 哇！ 到目前為止，已有22,000,000多人加入了AntiLand **

主要更新：
1.專屬頭像-水晶龍-一次只有一個人可以擁有。 系統每週都會根據活動來選擇要成為誰的人！
2.包括食蟻獸，黑豹和負鼠在內的新的第一類頭像
3.貼紙適用於所有帝國化身，大多數頭等化身和一些下等化身。 現在檢查您的頭像是否支持貼紙

更多改進：
-購買必須像瑞士手錶一樣工作，沒有錯誤了
-修復了打開應用程序時的鏈接，刪除，聊天審核，超能力，化身，配件坐標和滯後等

1. Merry X-Mas and a Happy New Year:
- new accessories for the holidays: Santa Hat and Light Garland
- a new avatar

2. Random Chat Upgrade:
- [Contacts] -> [Start a Random Chat] option now gives you a choice to see the profile and skip

1.新配件：
-防毒面具
-體育與愛好
-國家帽子
- 筆記本電腦
2.一些化身的升級圖像，包括與貼紙相匹配的樹懶
3.提高了應用程序的速度！
4. iOS 13 SDK支持
5.錯誤修復

在鎖定期間，保持健康，避免壓力並與社區在線保持聯繫。

帶著愛，
您的反土地

Bug fixes for:
- Push notifications
- App Review Request
- Crashes

Fixed bugs in:
- Send a Gift in Random chat
- Karma wall
- UX for new users
- UI glitch in Contacts

1. Cyber Eye - a new accessory inspired by one of our users, who is going to be the first one to own it!
2. Fixed crash on log out

重要更新v4.68
1）提高安全性
2）“發送禮物”更新：由於業力限制，無法與用戶聊天？ 嘗試先發送禮物
3）推送通知修復
4）新報告的原因：討厭的暱稱
5）修復了其他一些錯誤和崩潰

重要更新v4.69
1）增強安全性
2）嘗試發送禮物以與業障限制較高的用戶開始聊天
3）推送通知修復
4）投訴的新原因：煩人的暱稱
5）修復了一些錯誤和崩潰

V 4.70 Features:
Online Status - Better accuracy
Network - Better performance

4.71中的新功能：
1. iOS 14支持
2.新頭像-柯基

您隨時可以通過help@antiland.com歡迎您提供有關化身，配件和功能的新想法。
- Connection performance improved

-推送群聊通知
-聊天等級
-穩定性得到改善
-聖誕節和新年配件
- 修正了一些小錯誤
